Privacy Policy for Geocoder for GPT and POI Finder for ChatGPT

Effective Date: 12/09/2023

This privacy policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information
when you use our app.

By using GeocodeGPT, you agree to the collection and use
of information in accordance with this policy.

Information Collection and Use

We collect information that you provide directly to us, such as when you
interact with our app or request support.

This may include personal details
like your name, email address, or any other information you choose to provide.

Data Processing and Storage

The information we collect is processed and stored securely.
